org.kramerlab.bmad.algorithms

Class BooleanMatrixDecomposition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kramerlab.bmad.algorithms.BooleanMatrixDecomposition

  • public class BooleanMatrixDecomposition
extends Object
    Implementation of a generic boolean matrix decomposition algorithm, that fits into this framework. Such an algorithm consists of three parts: candidate generator, basis selector, and combinator. This implementation basically invokes methods of the subcomponents in the correct order.
